title: SolveigMM WMP Trimmer Plugin BE ver.3.0.1308.05
description:
WMP Trimmer Plugin 3.0.1308.05 Business Edition


SolveigMM WMP Trimmer Plugin is the popular tool that turns the well-known Windows Media Playerâ„¢ into a multimedia editor. The plugin saves and edit any movie/video clip or musical/audio track loaded in Windows Media Playerâ„¢. The editing process takes less than minute and keeps the original video quality and lip-sync. It is especially useful when creating webinars, removing commercials from recorded TV programs, censoring video/audio files for kids, making mobile phone ringtones, sharing a funny clip with friends or splitting big files to fit them on CDs. It supports such common media formats as AVI, WMV, ASF, WAV, WMA, MP3, MPEG-2, MPEG-1, AVCHD, FLV, MP4, MOV, WEBM, MKV.


Features:

Supports AVI files ( .avi )
Supports Windows Media files ( .asf, .wma, .wmv, .wm )
Supports WAV files ( .wav )
Supports MPEG Audio files ( .mp1, .mp2, .mp3, .mpa )
Supports MPEG-2 files ( .mpg, .vob, .ts )
Supports MPEG-1 files ( .mpg, .dat, .mp1 )
Supports AVCHD files ( .m2ts )
Supports MP4 files ( .mp4 )
Supports MOV files ( .mov )
Supports MKV files ( .mkv )
Supports FLV files ( .flv )
Supports WEBM files ( .webm )
Extracts sound to a separate audio file
Ability to mute audio on selected fragment without re-encoding
Frame accurate editing in Business Edition or K-Frame/GOP accurate in Home Edition
Can operate under Citrix XenApp 6.5
